When part of the system will continue to be in use in a modified form, the Disposal process helps ensure the proper handling of the portion being retired. Disposal of software systems encompasses the termination of services and disposal of software elements, stored data, media and firmware, information items, and associated hardware elements that will not be reused or transitioned to another system. The Disposal process is intended to be applicable in any stage of a software systems life cycle. For software, the Disposal process applies throughout the life
